name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-utility-flow-get-sharepoint-info-from-environment-variables
title: Get SharePoint information from environment variables
shortDescription: The Get Data Source List Info flow retrieves the site and list information
longDescription: The Get Data Source List Info flow retrieves the following site and list information: host_name, site_url, site_title, site_id, web_id, list_absolute_url, list_name, list_title, list_id, list_drive_id, error_message, success.
